q: What is the most important thing you learned these days?
a:
One of the most important things I have learned these days is that keeping a positive mindset has a strong impact on my daily life.

Even when situations donâ€™t go as planned, focusing on the positive side, from a stoic point of view, helps me stay motivated and find solutions instead of problems.

I also realized that positivity is contagious; when I stay calm and optimistic, it creates a more constructive and supportive atmosphere around me.
